title: lookingforsomething
author: lookingforsomething
content: Hi,I'm looking for an escrow with references to buy a service to some seller on TG.Thanks for helping!

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Well, it depends on what you are buying? But you can reach out to me.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: steve5946 on June 20, 2023, 08:17:02 AMWell, it depends on what you are buying? But you can reach out to me.I don't think your and the OP's forum rep to trust is not much different. If you leave this account with the fund then there are no way to find you. You have nothing to lose too.

comments.author: petulino
comments.body: Quote from: lookingforsomething on June 20, 2023, 08:14:22 AMHi,I'm looking for an escrow with references to buy a service to some seller on TG.Thanks for helping!welcome on board!may I know which kind of service you want to buy. Is seller is also have Bitcointalk account and selling any legal service. kf you give some details then it will be easy for Escrow service provider to help you

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Do not trust anyone that is not trustworthy, see the list of escrow providers on this forum:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0Check for the ones that are still active on this forum like Hhampuz. Quote from: steve5946 on June 20, 2023, 08:17:02 AMWell, it depends on what you are buying? But you can reach out to me.You have no reputable yet on this forum and you are saying he should reach out to you. That is not right. Have a good reputation before you start escrow service on this forum. You are not even on the list of escrow provider.

comments.author: lookingforsomething
comments.body: Thanks a lot for your replies, I thought those ones were not active anymore

You have nothing to lose too.Well, I'm just trying to help. BTW I have been here since 2017 and have services here.But you are right. My bad, OP should deal with another person, I'm not ready for any unnecessary headache.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: You can use Bounty Portal Telegram group own by Mr irfan (Trusted member) for safe deal. No fee will be charged and all trade will process smoothly. I already traded 500$+ there Official group: @officialbountyportalBuying selling group: @bptrades

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: lookingforsomething on June 20, 2023, 09:43:13 AMQuote from: _act_ on June 20, 2023, 08:19:25 AMDo not trust anyone that is not trustworthy, see the list of escrow providers on this forum:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2439910.0Check for the ones that are still active on this forum like Hhampuz. Quote from: steve5946 on June 20, 2023, 08:17:02 AMWell, it depends on what you are buying? But you can reach out to me.You have no reputable yet on this forum and you are saying he should reach out to you. That is not right. Have a good reputation before you start escrow service on this forum. You are not even on the list of escrow provider.he doesnt do escrow anymore Many lists here are outdated, when we talk about the escrow service, you should definitely be careful. The last list and the most recent one I know of are here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406507.msg60582815#msg60582815I don't know why there are only two members, but if my memory serves me well, it was after checking all the active members who offer this service. It could certainly be a recommendation for GazetaBitcoin, (if it still provides that service) because it is an active and reputable member here.Keep in mind that it is not mandatory for escrow to accept the proceeds in every store because sometimes it is not possible to determine the actual situation and whether all the details of the agreement have been met.
